    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blazing Aura](/Feats.aspx?ID=2564) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Ifrit" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=301" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
Your turn begins.

</column>

---

You explode in flame. Enemies in a 20-foot emanation take 7d6 fire damage (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). Allies in the area are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) for 1 round and can use the additional action to Strike or Stride.
